title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed based on personal taste, which should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view. The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be reachable from the editor, possibly via the Edit menu.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu or any other menu in the editor.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu or the Edit menu when a text selection is made in the editor.
SR: 1. Open the editor.2. Select a portion of text.3. Right-click to open the context menu.4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present in the context menu.5. If the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present, go to the Edit menu.6. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present in the Edit menu.7. Switch to the Outline view.8. Repeat steps 2-6 and verify if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is available in either the context menu or the Edit menu.
